name: vscode-extension-auto-import
displayName: Auto Import - ES6, TS, JSX, TSX
description: Automatically finds, parses and provides code actions and code completion for all available imports. Works with JavaScript and TypeScript. [Forked]

autoimport.filesToScan.description: Glob for files to watch and scan, e.g ./src/** ./src/app/**/*.ts. Defaults to **/*.{ts,tsx}

autoimport.showNotifications.description: Specifies wether to show notifications from Auto Import

autoimport.doubleQuotes.description: Specifies wether to use double quotes

autoimport.spaceBetweenBraces.description: Specifies wether to use spaces between first and last brace

autoimport.autoComplete.description: Adds found items to intellisense and automatically imports then

autoimport.higherOrderComponents.description: This allows the importer to find your components name bypass the higher order components that you wrap it in. Each higher order component must be deliminated by pipe |. example: connect|withRouter
